extensionName.message: Add Search Engine from Mycroft Project

extensionDescription.message: Provide a workaround to add search engines from Mycroft Project after Firefox 65.

instruction.message: To add the search engine, click the "â‹¯" menu in the address bar and select "Add Search Engine".

instruction60.message: To add the search engine, click the icon in the search bar and select "Add Search Engine".
